companies.name: TechNova Solutions
companies.description: TechNova Solutions is a leading AI-driven software company specializing in cloud-based applications and automation.
responsibilities: Develop scalable web applications using React and Node.js
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code

responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights
Develop dashboards and reports using Power BI
Collaborate with the engineering team to optimize data pipelines

companies.name: CyberShield Security
companies.description: CyberShield Security provides cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions to protect businesses from digital threats.
